datavillage-sdk¶

Features¶

  • Authentication

  • Users

  • Consent

  • Behaviours

  • Cages

Installation¶

Install datavillage-sdk by running:

pip install datavillage-sdk

Code Usage¶

class datavillage_sdk.auth.Authentication¶

This class provides you all authentication based services.

Initiate the class

from datavillage_sdk import Authentication

auth = Authentication()

This provides an auth object which can then be used to call methods in this class

get_application_token(clientid, clientsecret)¶

Use your client id and client secret, generated at https://developer.datavillage.me

Parameters

  • clientid (string) – clientid from developer portal

  • clientsecret (string) – your application secret

Returns

access token object

Return type

object

class datavillage_sdk.consent.Consent¶

This class provides the services around consent. - Create a new consent consent receipt - Manage privacy center - Check consent status

Initiate the class

from datavillage_sdk import Consent

consent = Consent()

This provides an consent object which can then be used to call methods in this class

create_consent_receipt(app_token, name, description, purpose, duration, data_categories, data_sources, creator_name, creator_uri, creator_logo, behaviour_extracted_frequency)¶

Use this method to create consent receipt.

Parameters

  • app_token (string) – application access token

  • name (string) – name of the consent receipt

  • description (string) – description

  • purpose (string) – purpose of the consent

  • duration (string) – duration

  • data_categories (string) – data_categories

  • data_sources (string) – data_sources

  • creator_name (string) – creator_name

  • creator_uri (string) – creator_uri

  • creator_logo (string) – creator_logo

  • behavior_extracted_frequency (string) – behavior_extracted_frequency

Returns

consent_receipt_processing

Return type

string

get_consent(consent_receipt_processing, user_access_token)¶

Create Consent based on the consent receipt

Parameters

  • consent_receipt_processing (string) – consent ID

  • user_access_token (string) – user access token

Returns

[description]

Return type

[type]

get_consent_receipt(consent_receipt_processing, app_token)¶

Use this to get consent receipt

Parameters

  • consent_receipt_processing (string) – consent ID

  • app_token (string) – application token

Returns

consent receipt details

Return type

object

Use this end-point to get consent receipt.

list_consent_receipts(app_token)¶

Get list of consent receipts created for your App

Parameters

app_token (string) – application token

Returns

[description]

Return type

[type]

class datavillage_sdk.behaviour.Behaviour¶

This class offers methods to manage a behaviours

from datavillage_sdk import Behaviour

behaviour = Behaviour()

create_behaviour(user, consent_receipt_processing, behaviour, user_access_token)¶

Create a new behaviour

Parameters

  • user (string) – unique user identifier

  • consent_receipt_processing (string) – consent receipt ID

  • behaviour (base64) – base64 encoded JSON-LD

  • user_access_token (string) – user access token

Returns

behaviour instance

Return type

object

get_all_behaviour(user, app_token)¶

This method is under construction

get_behaviour()¶

This method is under construction

class datavillage_sdk.cages.Cages¶

This class provides you all services around cages. A secure, privacy enabled container environment to execute your algorithm

Initiate the class

from datavillage_sdk import Cages

cage = Cages()

This provides an cage object which can then be used to call methods in this class

load_digital_profile(start_date, end_date, consent_receipt, user_access_token)¶

Load a digital profile

Parameters

  • start_date (date) – start date from to load data of a user in the cage

  • end_date (date) – end date upto which to load data of a user in the cage

  • consent_receipt (string) – consent_receipt ID

Returns

[description]

Return type

[type]

process_digital_profile(query, user_token, consent_receipt)¶

process digital profile

Parameters

  • query (string) – send behaviour filters

  • user_token (string) – user_access_token

  • consent_receipt (string) – consent_receipt_ID

Returns

[description]

Return type

[type]

query_digital_profile(query, user_access_token)¶

[summary]

Parameters

  • query (string) – graphQL query to execute on the schema.

  • user_token (string) – user_access_token

Returns

[description]

Return type

[type]
